verses.name: Leviticus 9:13
verses.text: And they presented the burnt offering unto him, with the pieces thereof, and the head: and he burnt them upon the altar.

verses.name: Leviticus 9:14
verses.text: And he did wash the inwards and the legs, and burnt them upon the burnt offering on the altar.

verses.name: Leviticus 9:15
verses.text: And he brought the people’s offering, and took the goat, which was the sin offering for the people, and slew it, and offered it for sin, as the first.

verses.name: Leviticus 9:16
verses.text: And he brought the burnt offering, and offered it according to the manner.
